title: Crisis Stabilization
subtitle: Finding your feet when the ground has disappeared
description: Gentle, practical tools for when you're in acute distress. No pressure, no performanceâ€”just what helps right now.

questions.question: What is the most important thing to remember during a crisis?
options: You should be stronger than this
This will pass, and you don't have to face it alone
You need to fix everything right now

questions.question: What does 'the smallest next thing' mean?
options: Focusing only on what you can do in the next few minutes
